long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ClubLink.to helps you to promote your Clubhouse events. It prepares a SEO-optimized event page with an appealing social sharing image on top. 

With this extension you can save yourself some time by simply using it on your events directly. It allows you to optimize your Clubhouse link in one click.
